findings.title: Everything you need to know about viral personal AI assistant Clawdbot (now Moltbot)
findings.summary: Clawdbot was renamed to Moltbot. All functionality remains the same, and clawdbot command still works as a compatibility shim.

findings.title: Moltbot Is Taking Over Silicon Valley
findings.summary: He reckons that AI companies will all release personal assistants in 2026. But so far, he has seen nobody really ask the question: how can I have this and also own my data?

findings.title: All about Moltbot (Clawdbot): AI assistant that 'actually does things ...'
findings.summary: Moltbot (formerly known as Clawdbot) has recently become one of the fastest-growing open-source AI tools.

findings.title: OpenClaw AI Assistant Security Update
findings.summary: Updates about Clawdbot > Moltbot > OpenClaw security features. Peter Steinberger from GitHub.

findings.title: Moltbot: The Ultimate Personal AI Assistant Guide for 2026
findings.summary: A comprehensive guide to Moltbot (formerly Clawdbot) for 2026. Covers installation, setup, skills, automation, and advanced usage.
